name: Heavenly Helper
description:
Welcome to Heavenly Helper.  For those who need that little extra push! 

Today is your job trial. Our goal here at Heavenly Helper is to gently transition our passing patients safely to heaven. They are undeserving sinners. It’s truly amazing what money can do!

Programming by Joseph Quested

Art, music and audio by ferby.exe 

Voice over by our special friend Max Giles
